title: Premium touch.

materials.name: The Surface
materials.desc: High-pressure laminate (HPL) on an anti-warp 25mm core. Scuff-proof, zero-smudge, edged with hard 2mm ABS.

materials.name: The Bones
materials.desc: Cold-rolled 70×70mm steel. Powder-coated in deep RAL tones. Built to survive the grind without a scratch.

materials.name: The Base
materials.desc: Die-cast zinc alloy anchors. Felt-padded default. ±15mm leveling for imperfect floors.
